alert.note: Alert for Eastern Bergen; Eastern Essex; Eastern Passaic; Western Bergen; Western Essex; Western Passaic; Western Union (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 6:28PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Passaic, northwestern Union, northern Bergen, Essex, southeastern Orange and Rockland Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 627 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Green Pond to near Orange. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Paterson, Passaic, Wayne, Bloomfield, New City, Orange, Paramus, West Milford, Ridgewood, Summit, Millburn, Monsey, Nanuet, Ramsey and Ringwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Bergen; Eastern Essex; Eastern Passaic; Western Bergen; Western Essex; Western Passaic; Western Union
